name: China Singapore Suzhou Industrial Park Ventures
overview: China-Singapore Suzhou Industrial Park Venture Company (CSVC) is one of participating projects of CSSD. The company was founded on Nov 28, 2001 with the registered capital of RMB1,280 million. The company aims at accelerating industrialization of hi-technology and breeding medium and diminutive sized companies own independent property rights. CSVC is engaged in direct investment in the stages of initial establishment and development of hi-tech companies. Meanwhile, CSVC is engaged in providing loan guarantee for medium and diminutive sized companies and for companies that are ready for IPO. CSVC participates in cooperation with multinational companies for tactful investments.

offices.address2: #158 Wangdun Road, Suzhou Industrial Park, Jiangsu Province
